# MTLIOCommandQueueType.serial

**Case**

Sets a new input/output command queue’s type to a queue that runs commands serially.

## Declaration

```swift
case serial
```

## I/O command queue types

- **MTLIOCommandQueueType.concurrent**: Sets a new input/output command queue’s type to a queue that runs commands concurrently.
